result.markdown: --- title: "" --- ## Week 12 ### Day 1 #### [Today]{style="color:red;"} ##### Discuss Smith et al. 2022; led by Waverly Davis. ##### Discuss Northrup et al. 2022 #### [Assigned]{style="color:red;"} - Readings for next class: - A plain language review for modeling animal habitat-selection (draft) The assigned reading is a draft manuscript that I am looking for feedback. Please feel free to make comments directly on the google doc. I am looking for areas of confusion, areas of flow or introduction of concepts that may be out of order, and areas that we can cut/de-emphasize, and areas that need expanding. This manuscript is not so much a review, but a modern synthesis to give some important context/opinion and then point the reader to modern papers. ### Day 2 (lab) #### [Today]{style="color:red;"} ##### **In Class Discussion of draft manuscript** - Downloads: Files - Install R packages: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # CRAN packages install.packages(c("terra","raster","amt","MASS")) ``` ::: #### [Assigned]{style="color:red;"} - Wright et al 2020
